title: Peculiar Rapper

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Each night, attack a number of players equal to the number of bars you said in the last day chat, but no more than six.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- A bar is composed of two consecutive messages whose last syllables rhyme with each other.
- Rhymes don't have to be perfect and are up to host discretion. Rhymes may not be on only unstressed syllables (e.g. "fiddle" and "fatal" don't rhyme).

desc:
Post 3470
*I'm killin' little infants cuz I don't give a fuck (kawaii!)*
